title: The EMOTIONAL BACKPACK: Lightening the load for a resilient life
description: Emotional backpacks carry invisible burdens like trauma, regrets and unresolved emotions, which can hinder resilience and mental well-being if unmanaged. Suppressing emotions leads to chronic stress and health decline, while proactive emotional management enh…
